<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0892832bb6c7e322fcae8560eaad5a8140ee4a06|patch 8.2.0084: complete item "user_data" can only be a string>
patch 8.2.0084: complete item "user_data" can only be a string

Problem:    Complete item "user_data" can only be a string.
Solution:   Accept any type of variable. (closes #5412)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0084: complete item "user_data" can only be a string · vim/vim@0892832
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0084: complete item "user_data" can only be a string · vim/vim@0892832
attachments.text: Problem: Complete item "user_data" can only be a string. Solution: Accept any type of variable. (closes #5412)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/467c32bd72efea09677f173fef7a3465d9ab7826|patch 8.2.0081: MS-Windows also need the change to support INIT4()>
patch 8.2.0081: MS-Windows also need the change to support INIT4()

Problem:    MS-Windows also need the change to support INIT4().
Solution:   Add the ctags arguments. (Ken Takata)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0081: MS-Windows also need the change to support INIT4() · vim/vim@467c32b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0081: MS-Windows also need the change to support INIT4() · vim/vim@467c32b
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows also need the change to support INIT4(). Solution: Add the ctags arguments. (Ken Takata)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f10997a1543eb0724d882da3678bacd44e647141|patch 8.2.0082: when reusing a buffer listeners are not cleared>
patch 8.2.0082: when reusing a buffer listeners are not cleared

Problem:    When reusing a buffer listeners are not cleared. (Axel Forsman)
Solution:   Clear listeners when reusing a buffer. (closes #5431)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0082: when reusing a buffer listeners are not cleared · vim/vim@f10997a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0082: when reusing a buffer listeners are not cleared · vim/vim@f10997a
attachments.text: Problem: When reusing a buffer listeners are not cleared. (Axel Forsman) Solution: Clear listeners when reusing a buffer. (closes #5431)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5cb0b93d52fa5c12ca50a18509947ee6459bb7a8|patch 8.2.0083: text properties wrong when tabs and spaces are exchanged>
patch 8.2.0083: text properties wrong when tabs and spaces are exchanged

Problem:    Text properties wrong when tabs and spaces are exchanged.
Solution:   Take text properties into account. (Nobuhiro Takasaki,
            closes #5427)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0083: text properties wrong when tabs and spaces are exchanged · vim/vim@5cb0b93
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0083: text properties wrong when tabs and spaces are exchanged · vim/vim@5cb0b93
attachments.text: Problem: Text properties wrong when tabs and spaces are exchanged. Solution: Take text properties into account. (Nobuhiro Takasaki, closes #5427)
